title: Marc Ford - It's About Time [320k MP3]
description:
It's About Time is a 2002 album by American rock guitarist and singer Marc Ford, former guitarist of The Black Crowes. It was the debut solo album by Ford, and received good reviews. Notable musicians who collaborated with Ford on this album include Ben Harper, Gary Louris (The Jayhawks), Warren Haynes, Allen Woody, Matt Abts (Gov't Mule)
